name: Các môn thể thao phổ biến (Popular Sports)

words.example: They played football in the park every Sunday.
She loves to play basketball with her friends.
The team won the volleyball match in three sets.
He plays tennis every Saturday morning.
Badminton is a popular sport in many Asian countries.
They played a quick game of table tennis after dinner.
Baseball is very popular in the United States and Japan.
Many people watch American football on Sundays during the season.
He enjoys playing golf on the weekends with his colleagues.
Swimming is a great way to stay fit and cool in summer.
She competes in athletics at a national level.
Cycling is an eco-friendly way to travel around the city.
